| Option | Value | Description | Default |
|:------:|:-----:|:------------|:-------:|
| scale | float | Scale by which to enlarge the entire diagram by | 15 |
| linewidth | float | Width of drawn lines | 2 |
| color | str | Default color for everything | 'black' |
